name: Space Worm (Jeff Bishop)
description:
A wise friend of mine once said "Worms is the freest spirits there is." That inspired me to make a gif - and that gif inspired me to make this game! Space Worm! Play it now (takes about 5 minutes to complete), or download it and play it later! I don't care, what am I, the worm police?

"Mistake the Getaway", "The Other Side of the Door"
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
